summary: Premium corporate website for Kapoor Builders & Co., a construction company with 24+ years of experience in Delhi NCR. Navy blue and gold color theme with luxurious design featuring hero section, about us, services, projects gallery, reviews, and contact sections.
architectural_notes: Navy blue and gold color scheme matching provided logo
SEO optimized for 'Construction Company in Delhi NCR'
Premium corporate aesthetic with luxurious feel
Updated stats: 100+ Completed Projects, 200+ Happy Clients
Office location: D-37, Block D, Radheypuri, Krishna Nagar, Delhi, 110051 with Google Maps integration

existing_features.title: Implement hero section with headline 'Building Trust. Creating Landmarks.', subheading '24+ Years of Excellence in Construction, Collaboration & Interior Solutions in Delhi NCR.', two CTA buttons ('Call Now' and 'Get Free Consultation'), and a premium modern building project background image

Create About Us section with the exact provided company description highlighting 24+ years of experience, specializations in construction/collaboration/interiors, real estate services, and commitment to quality and transparency

Build Services section with 7 elegant service cards: Residential Construction, Commercial Construction, Builder Floor Projects, Construction Collaboration, Turnkey Projects, Interior Design & Execution, and Real Estate Development, each with premium icons

Implement Why Choose Us section highlighting 6 key differentiators: 24+ Years Experience, On-Time Project Delivery, Transparent Pricing, Skilled & Professional Team, Quality Craftsmanship, and Trusted Across Delhi NCR
Create Projects Gallery with modern grid layout displaying high-resolution images of luxury homes, commercial buildings, and interior projects
Build Reviews section with customer testimonial slider and review submission form collecting Name, Rating (1-5 stars), and Message

Implement Contact section with embedded Google Maps for Delhi NCR location, click-to-call buttons for 9891117126 and 9311737126, owner name display (Sumit Kapoor), and contact form with Name, Phone, and Message fields
Create Footer with company logo, quick links navigation, contact details (phone numbers 9891117126 and 9311737126), social media icons, and copyright text 'Â© 2026 Kapoor Builders & Co.'
Apply navy blue and gold color theme consistently throughout the website matching the uploaded logo colors, creating a luxurious, corporate, and trustworthy visual identity
Integrate the uploaded company logo (kbc 123.jpeg) as a static asset throughout the website including header and footer, using the exact logo without modifications
Ensure fully responsive design with smooth animations, clean layout, professional typography, and premium corporate aesthetic optimized for both mobile and desktop viewing
Optimize website for fast loading speed and SEO targeting 'Construction Company in Delhi NCR' with proper meta tags, semantic HTML, and performance best practices
In the About section statistics cards, change '500+' to '100+' for the projects completed count
In the About section statistics cards, change '1000+' to '200+' for the satisfied clients count
Update the Contact section location display to show 'D-37, Block D, Radheypuri, Krishna Nagar, Delhi, 110051'
Update the embedded Google Maps iframe in the Contact section to use the provided Google Maps URL for Kapoor Builders & Co. at coordinates 28.6575323, 77.2883587
